member.summary: Massive loading of payrolls and CUDs from a pdf file

member.name: M:NatunaAPI.Controllers.EmployeesController.PutUpdateDeleteUploadSession(System.Int32)

member.param: id of the element to be deleted

member.param: can be LastName + FirstName, FiscalCode or IdentificationNumber

member.name: M:NatunaAPI.Controllers.EmployeesController.GetEmployee(System.Int32)
